description.p: The alithimar represent the lawful goodness of the upper planes where blessed warriors dwell. Imbued with this righteous zeal, they are often found fighting the forces of chaos in defense of the innocent.
Your alithimar character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Alignment. Most alithimar have a strong tendency toward lawful good alignments.
Size. Alithimar are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canâ€™t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Strict Moral Code. You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or possessed.
Gathered to Battle. You have proficiency with light and medium armor and with two martial weapons of your choice.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Celestial and two other languages of your choice.
